channel.title: (317)how to add item to a moster drop
channel.description: can someone explain to me how to add a item to a monster drop but i want the item to be rare can someone help me please i know it in npcdrop file but like if i want to add a good drop but it like hard to get can someone explain please

item.title: (317)how to add item to a moster drop
item.dc:creator: @The_cook_from_runesc The cook from runescape
item.description:
@The_cook_from_runesc wrote:

Liljrbaby:

lol don’t really feel like it because then i have to change all of the npc drops like that um hmm because i want it rare and shit hmm lol hmm

hmm yes hmm, well unless you write your own code and add an extra column for each item on the percentage chance it’s the only way. As long as you’re only doing it for this or a few more, just do what the previous poster said and fill out a load of other drops.

Read full topic

item.title: (317)how to add item to a moster drop
item.dc:creator: @mastercc mastercc
item.description:
@mastercc wrote:

try to make it like

//abbysal
npcdrop = 995 1023 2841 8002 1027 1931 1421

so the possibility of the monster to drop a certain item vary because there are so many different items.

however i don’t know why your npcdrops file look like that mine looks like this

item.title: (317)how to add item to a moster drop
item.dc:creator: @Liljrbaby Liljrbaby
item.description:
@Liljrbaby wrote:

hmm i kinda don’t want to understand mine lke this

//abbysal
npcdrop = 2263 5509 1 10

ok i understand it dropping a item that the id is 2263 but what the 5509 for and the 1 and 10??? this is all i understand if want to add a item to drops

//abbysal
npcdrop = 8002

8002 is d claws what to do to make it rare after?

item.title: (317)how to add item to a moster drop
item.dc:creator: @mastercc mastercc
item.description:
@mastercc wrote:

as it says in the file

//--------NPCID---------DropType--------Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----
npcdrop = 1 1 995 3 995 4 995 5 995 6 995 7 995 8 995 9 995 10 995 11 995 12 995 13 995 14 995 15

i think the basic idea that you should add “1038” (red phat) and change the amount from 4 to 1 and add alot of “995” (coins) drops so the red phat drop will be rare

Read full topic
